name: sideshow
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
a small show or event in addition to the main entertainment: Carol won a large soft toy at a sideshow at the fair.
an event or subject that is connected to another event or subject but is considered to be much less important: The media still regards women's sport as a sideshow to the main event.
